nodes.text: A heavy weapons repulsorlift squad was a basic formation of the Imperial Army of the Galactic Empire.

Similar to a standard repulsorlift squad, the vehicles employed by the squad were outfitted with additional armaments that could, if needed, be dismounted by the soldiers and used as additional fire support. Typical armaments including a heavy repeating blaster, a Merr-Sonn 4.4 grenade launcher or a light laser cannon.
